Two delightfully theme-y new Ribbon Around a Bomb podcasts are available for download! [Tribe 8] Edition 41: Johnny, Are You Queer? is our “very gay episode” of RAAB Radio, and … Continue reading →

In the Mood for… Pride

Arts Bombast: Hannah Höch

Add her to the list of my favorite women– the brilliant Hannah Höch was the LONE female artist in the Berlin Dada scene. Feminist, dyke, and originator of the photomontage … Continue reading →

Arts Bombast: Genesis Breyer P-Orridge

Let’s talk about the unbelievable boundlessness of true love, guys. I’m totes serious. [Genesis P-Orridge- circa 1980?] [Genesis Breyer P-Orridge, post-op- circa… late ’90s?] Last night, I heard a poem … Continue reading →

In the Mood For… Androgynous Women
